summary: Prepares separate parallel corpora for each semiotic class by reading preprocessed data, extracting source (written) and destination (spoken) strings, tokenizing them appropriately, organizing them into class-specific directories, and generating Giza++ run scripts for alignment.
business_intent: Enable the creation of class‑specific alignment data needed to train text‑normalization models by automating the preparation of Giza++‑ready corpora from the Google Text Normalization dataset.
